value:
$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|I think I ought to explain once more...
This place...has been consumed by
the Tempest's chaos.$k$pI need your help to close the vortex
that rages at its heart.$k$p$WmMPID_行楽ジェニー,ch10_13_Jenny_F_Picnic19,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_行楽ルカ,ch10_15_Luka_M_Picnic19,Face|I think we all understand the situation
at hand... It's just...$k$p$WmMPID_行楽ジェニー,ch10_13_Jenny_F_Picnic19,Face|We're not going to have to cancel
our picnic, are we?$k$pThis was our one time to relax...
And I was so looking forward to it!$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|W-well, er...$k$p$WmMPID_行楽ルカ,ch10_15_Luka_M_Picnic19,Face|If my understanding is right, we don't
need to cancel—we simply have to
defeat the vortex!$k$pLet's handle it quickly so we can
return to our picnic!$k$p$WmMPID_行楽フェリシア,ch05_15_Felicia_F_Picnic19,Face|Oh no, oh no! We have a problem!$k$p$WmMPID_行楽ルカ,ch10_15_Luka_M_Picnic19,Face|What's the matter, Felicia?$k$p$WmMPID_行楽フェリシア,ch05_15_Felicia_F_Picnic19,Face|The food I prepared for our picnic
turned this strange color!$k$pI even got out of bed extra early to
work on it... I put everything I have
into making it!$k$pIt MUST be the vortex's doing! Grr...
Now I'm really steamed up! You'll
never get away with this, you...vortex!$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|I have never seen the vortex produce
chaos of such a magnitude... Perhaps
we should destroy that dish to start...$k$p$WmMPID_行楽ルカ,ch10_15_Luka_M_Picnic19,Face|I—er... We're with you, Felicia! Let's
team up and quell this chaos!$k$p

$WmMPID_行楽ルカ,ch10_15_Luka_M_Picnic19,Face|The vortex is disappearing...$k$pDoes that mean we eliminated the
source of the chaos?$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|Yes. Thank you, Heroes.$k$pThis world will see another day
because of your efforts.$k$p$WmMPID_行楽ジェニー,ch10_13_Jenny_F_Picnic19,Face|Wow! The sky sure has cleared up
and everything... Even Mister Sun has
come out!$k$p$WmMPID_行楽ルカ,ch10_15_Luka_M_Picnic19,Face|Hm. Then everything must be
returning to normal.$k$p$WmMPID_行楽フェリシア,ch05_15_Felicia_F_Picnic19,Face|You're right!$k$pEven the picnic goodies I made have
returned to their original color!$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|Wh-what?! H-how cou—$k$pThat sickly nightmare purple was
the goal? It doesn't even look like
anything I would call food...$k$p$WmMPID_行楽フェリシア,ch05_15_Felicia_F_Picnic19,Face|Heehee... This one turned out way
better than my last few attempts.
I'm pretty proud of it, actually!$k$pOh! I have an idea! Why don't you
join our picnic, Marth? We can all
enjoy a nice lunch together!$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|Hrk!$k$pErr... N-no, that's, umm... I, uh...
I already ate! YES! Yes. I already ate...$k$p$WmMPID_行楽ルカ,ch10_15_Luka_M_Picnic19,Face|Oh, I'm sure you've worked up
something of an appetite while we've
been taking on the Tempest!$k$pC'mon! It's about time we got back
to the picnic we came here for!$k$p$WmMPID_行楽ジェニー,ch10_13_Jenny_F_Picnic19,Face|Yay! Time for some fun!$k$pC'mon, Marth! Let's go!$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|...$k$pHear me, Naga... In the name of the
exalted blood, I ask for the divine
dragon's protection...$k$p
